scripts.scss: npx node-sass --output-style nested --indent-type tab --indent-with 4 -o dist/css src/scss/ && npx uglifycss dist/css/styles.css > dist/css/styles.min.css
scripts.uglify: npx babel --presets es2015 src/js/ --out-file dist/js/main.js && npx uglifyjs dist/js/main.js -m -c -o dist/js/main.min.js
scripts.icons: npx svgo -f src/images/icons && npx svg-sprite-generator -d src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch:all: npx parallelshell 'npm run build:all' 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.postinstall: npx parallelshell 'mkdir -p dist/images' 'mkdir -p dist/html' 'mkdir -p dist/css' 'mkdir -p dist/js' && npm run watch:all
